description: The salsa that I spoon over the salmon here is an explosion of contrasting flavors – sweet, salty and sharp – common in Sicilian cooking I like serving this with sautéed greens and some bread.
title: Pan-Seared Salmon With Celery, Olives and Capers
title_page: Pan-Seared Salmon With Celery, Olives and Capers Recipe - NYT Cooking
